definition: rowing competition/boat race/swimming competition (e.g. to cross river or lake)

sentences.english: The Yuanling dragon boat race boasts four World Bests.
sentences.chinese: 沅陵龙舟竞渡拥有四个世界之最。

sentences.english: The Dragon-boat race is always a popular festival event in all parts of China.
sentences.chinese: 龙舟竞渡，历来是深受各地民众喜爱的节日活动。

sentences.english: Dragon boat race is one of the traditional Chinese sports.
sentences.chinese: “龙舟竞渡”是中华民族传统体育项目之一。

sentences.english: However, it than China's "Dragon Boat Festival" Late nearly 2000.
sentences.chinese: 但是，它比我国的“龙舟竞渡”晚了将近2000年。

sentences.english: Actually, "Dragon Boat Festival" early in the warring states period.
sentences.chinese: 其实，“龙舟竞渡”早在战国时代就有了。

sentences.english: Shanghang County Dragon Boat Festival with boat tie-shaped reed plays Zuolong waterfront, known as the Boat Race.
sentences.chinese: 上杭县端午用小艇缚芦苇作龙形戏于水滨，称为竞渡。

sentences.english: In fact, "Dragon Boat Festival" as early as in the warring states period.
sentences.chinese: 其实，“龙舟竞渡”早在战国时代就有了。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is reasonable to regard Yuanling as the hometown of the traditional Chinese dragon boat race.
sentences.chinese: 因此，将传统龙舟竞渡的故乡定于沅陵是可信的。

sentences.english: China, as a big country by the sports physical, is gradually powering forward.
sentences.chinese: 龙舟竞渡是我国一项传统的体育项目。

sentences.english: Dongting Lake is famous in Chinese culture as the place of origin of Dragon boat racing.
sentences.chinese: 洞庭湖是著名的中华文化作为原产地的龙舟竞渡。

sentences.english: Boating competitions are held here during every Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 每到端午节，这里都会举行飞舟竞渡的划龙船比赛。

definition: dragon boat (used at 端午[Duan1 wu3], the Dragon Boat Festival)
folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
see 端午節|端午节[Duan1 wu3 jie2]
to sing and dance/general term for a round dance
to hold a semiannual ceremony of purification
name of a river, the southern tributary of Miluo river 汨羅江|汨罗江[Mi4 luo2 jiang1]
